Design
Design

    Promo Panel

    Version 1.0
    Status Released

    The promo panel component is a component that will allow content editors to quickly create promo panels.

    Title goes here and has a maximum of 64 character limit

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

    Component Attributes

    NameFriendly NameDefault
    body_backgroundBackground colour
    typeVariant
    promo_imageImage
    image_alignmentImage alignment
    iconIcon
    titleTitle
    abstractAbstract
    bodyBody
    link_typeLink Type
    cta_link_titleCTA Title
    cta_linkCTA Link
    primary_link_titlePrimary Button Title
    primary_linkPrimary Button Link
    secondary_link_titleSecondary Button Title
